title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10052.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10052.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth procedures in addition to those
contained in 6 NYCRR Part
617
that are necessary and appropriate for the Long

Island Power Authority's implementation of the State Environmental Quality

Review Act following the authority's acquisition of the Long Island Lighting

Company. The terms used in this Part have the meanings given them in 6 NYCRR
Part
617
unless the context otherwise requires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10052.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
